name: Zircuit
description: Zircuit is the AI-powered blockchain for secure, automated finance. As a fully EVM-compatible zero-knowledge rollup, Zircuit combines advanced AI, zero-knowledge proofs, and robust infrastructure to deliver unmatched safety, performance, and scalability. Every transaction is protected at the sequencer level by AI models, creating a highly secure environment for users and developers. Designed for internet-scale applications, Zircuit reduces gas fees and boosts transaction speed, unlocking the full potential of Web3 while remaining fully protected.
